result.content:
• Expand All
  • Collapse All

Precompiled Libraries



  • Expand All
  • Collapse All

Included page: .FlexOvl.DeviceManagement.SetUp (edit)

import
com.alliander.osgp.platform.acceptancetests

script
start scoped giv wen zen for slim devicemanagement Test not run


Narrative

As OSGP I want to receive event notifications of a device

NOTE

OSGP does not store event notification settings and does not know whether a device is allowed to send a particular notification. Therefore each supported event notification is stored when it is received from a registered device. The OSP client is responsible for maintaining event notification settings.

Scenario: Successfully receive event notifications

scenario example device eventtype description index
given a registered device @device
and a OSLP event notification message with @eventtype and @description and @index
when the OSLP event notification message is received
then the OSLP event notification message is stored on OSP
and the OSP sends an OSLP event notification message with status OK

example
device eventtype description index
device1 DIAG_EVENTS_GENERAL General problem EMPTY
scenario example device eventtype description index
given a registered device device1
and a OSLP event notification message with DIAG_EVENTS_GENERAL and General problem and EMPTY
when the OSLP event notification message is received
then the OSLP event notification message is stored on OSP
and the OSP sends an OSLP event notification message with status OK
device1 HARDWARE_FAILURE_RELAY Some description EMPTY
scenario example device eventtype description index
given a registered device device1
and a OSLP event notification message with HARDWARE_FAILURE_RELAY and Some description and EMPTY
when the OSLP event notification message is received
then the OSLP event notification message is stored on OSP
and the OSP sends an OSLP event notification message with status OK
device1 LIGHT_FAILURE_DALI_COMMUNICATION Some description EMPTY
scenario example device eventtype description index
given a registered device device1
and a OSLP event notification message with LIGHT_FAILURE_DALI_COMMUNICATION and Some description and EMPTY
when the OSLP event notification message is received
then the OSLP event notification message is stored on OSP
and the OSP sends an OSLP event notification message with status OK

scenario example device eventtype description index
given a registered device device1
and a OSLP event notification message with LIGHT_FAILURE_BALLAST and Some description and EMPTY
when the OSLP event notification message is received
then the OSLP event notification message is stored on OSP
and the OSP sends an OSLP event notification message with status OK

scenario example device eventtype description index
given a registered device device1
and a OSLP event notification message with LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_ON and Some description and EMPTY
when the OSLP event notification message is received
then the OSLP event notification message is stored on OSP
and the OSP sends an OSLP event notification message with status OK

scenario example device eventtype description index
given a registered device device1
and a OSLP event notification message with LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_OFF and Some description and EMPTY
when the OSLP event notification message is received
then the OSLP event notification message is stored on OSP
and the OSP sends an OSLP event notification message with status OK

scenario example device eventtype description index
given a registered device device1
and a OSLP event notification message with MONITOR_EVENTS_LONG_BUFFER_FULL and Some description and EMPTY
when the OSLP event notification message is received
then the OSLP event notification message is stored on OSP

when the OSLP event notification message is received

given a registered device device1

scenario example device eventtype description index
given a registered device device1

when the OSLP event notification message is received
then the OSLP event notification message is stored on OSP
and the OSP sends an OSLP event notification message with status OK

scenario example device eventtype description index
given a registered device device1
and a OSLP event notification message with MONITOR_FAILURE_P1_COMMUNICATION and Some description and EMPTY
when the OSLP event notification message is received
then the OSLP event notification message is stored on OSP
and the OSP sends an OSLP event notification message with status OK

scenario example device eventtype description index
given a registered device device1
and a OSLP event notification message with COMM_EVENTS_ALTERNATIVE_CHANNEL and Some description and EMPTY
when the OSLP event notification message is received
then the OSLP event notification message is stored on OSP
and the OSP sends an OSLP event notification message with status OK
device1 COMM_EVENTS_RECOVERED_CHANNEL Some description EMPTY
scenario example device eventtype description index
given a registered device device1
and a OSLP event notification message with COMM_EVENTS_RECOVERED_CHANNEL and Some description and EMPTY
when the OSLP event notification message is received
then the OSLP event notification message is stored on OSP
and the OSP sends an OSLP event notification message with status OK
device1 DIAG_EVENTS_GENERAL General problem 0
scenario example device eventtype description index
given a registered device device1
and a OSLP event notification message with DIAG_EVENTS_GENERAL and General problem and 0
when the OSLP event notification message is received
then the OSLP event notification message is stored on OSP
and the OSP sends an OSLP event notification message with status OK
device1 LIGHT_FAILURE_DALI_COMMUNICATION Light is broken 1
scenario example device eventtype description index
given a registered device device1
and a OSLP event notification message with LIGHT_FAILURE_DALI_COMMUNICATION and Light is broken and 1
when the OSLP event notification message is received
then the OSLP event notification message is stored on OSP
and the OSP sends an OSLP event notification message with status OK

Scenario: Receive event notifications from an unregistered device

scenario example unregistered device eventtype description index
given a unregistered device @device
and a OSLP event notification message with @eventtype and @description and @index
when the OSLP event notification message is received
then the OSLP event notification message is not stored on OSP
and the OSP sends an OSLP event notification message with status REJECTED

example unregistered
device eventtype description index
UNKNOWN FIRMWARE_EVENTS_ACTIVATING Hacking!!!! EMPTY
scenario example unregistered device eventtype description index
given a unregistered device UNKNOWN
and a OSLP event notification message with FIRMWARE_EVENTS_ACTIVATING and Hacking!!!! and EMPTY
when the OSLP event notification message is received
then the OSLP event notification message is not stored on OSP
and the OSP sends an OSLP event notification message with status REJECTED

Scenario: Receive multiple event notifications in one request

scenario example multiple device eventtypes indexes numberOfEvents
given a registered device @device
and a OSLP event notification message with multiple @eventtypes and @indexes
when the OSLP event notification message is received
then @numberOfEvents OSLP event notification messages is stored on OSP each with @indexes
and the OSP sends an OSLP event notification message with status OK

example multiple
device eventtypes indexes numberOfEvents
device1 LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_ON 0 1
scenario example multiple device eventtypes indexes numberOfEvents
given a registered device device1
and a OSLP event notification message with multiple LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_ON and 0
when the OSLP event notification message is received
then 1 OSLP event notification messages is stored on OSP each with 0
and the OSP sends an OSLP event notification message with status OK
device1 LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_ON 1 1
scenario example multiple device eventtypes indexes numberOfEvents
given a registered device device1
and a OSLP event notification message with multiple LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_ON and 1
when the OSLP event notification message is received
then 1 OSLP event notification messages is stored on OSP each with 1
and the OSP sends an OSLP event notification message with status OK
device1 LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_ON, LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_ON 1, 2 2
scenario example multiple device eventtypes indexes numberOfEvents
given a registered device device1
and a OSLP event notification message with multiple LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_ON, LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_ON and 1, 2
when the OSLP event notification message is received
then 2 OSLP event notification messages is stored on OSP each with 1, 2
and the OSP sends an OSLP event notification message with status OK
device1 LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_ON, LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_ON, LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_OFF 1, 2, 4 3
scenario example multiple device eventtypes indexes numberOfEvents
given a registered device device1
and a OSLP event notification message with multiple LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_ON, LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_ON, LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_OFF and 1, 2, 4
when the OSLP event notification message is received
then 3 OSLP event notification messages is stored on OSP each with 1, 2, 4
and the OSP sends an OSLP event notification message with status OK
device1 LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_ON, HARDWARE_FAILURE_RELAY 1, 1 2
scenario example multiple device eventtypes indexes numberOfEvents
given a registered device device1
and a OSLP event notification message with multiple LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_ON, HARDWARE_FAILURE_RELAY and 1, 1
when the OSLP event notification message is received
then 2 OSLP event notification messages is stored on OSP each with 1, 1
and the OSP sends an OSLP event notification message with status OK

Contents:
  • Exploratory Tests (PBI55): Exploratory test for receiving event notifications

  • Expand All
  • Collapse All
